title: Missing Star Guardian Icon
body:
I'm a patient person, and reading other post I have found out it should not take more than a week to recieve SG icon. Well it will be a week tomorrow as I took the quiz last Friday. Most of my friends got their icon days ago and just wondering why I'm still missing it, but hopefully I will come in by tomorrow.  

 ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

replies.body: It can take *up to* a week to receive it. If you don't have it after tomorrow, please let me know so I can look into this further.

Hey I know this is a really old comment but I was really looking forward to this icon and even after doing the test multiple times on multiple browsers during the period I didn't receive it. Is it possible for you to look into that for me or have I missed my chance completely? 

Thanks for your time :)
We can take a look at what we can do if you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). ^.^
Thanks for the response, did exactly that.

> [{quoted}](name=Nazera,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AqpoepA8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-14T23:14:35.290+0000)
>
> STILLLLLL WAITING.......

It's funny, I can't even check. I got alpha last night, and got hacked this morning. I don't have access to my account..
Says I got an icon gift but nothing new is there
Same... still waiting. Several of my teammates already received theirs & did it the same day.
